loginPage.title: RE A O AMOHELA HAPE!
loginPage.subtitle: Ka kopo kenya dintlha tsa hao ho kena.
loginPage.emailPlaceholder: Kenya aterese ya hao ya imeili
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: [ST] Login successful, but no token received. Please contact support.
loginPage.errorDefault: [ST] Login failed. Please check your credentials.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: [ST] An unknown network error occurred. Please try again.

registrationPage.title: QALA JWALE
registrationPage.subtitle: Theha akhaonto ya hao ya Mavito.
registrationPage.firstNamePlaceholder: Kenya lebitso la hao la pele
registrationPage.emailPlaceholder: Kenya aterese ya hao ya imeili
registrationPage.haveAccount: O se o na le akhaonto?
registrationPage.errorPasswordsDoNotMatch: Mantswe a lekunutu ha a tshwane.
registrationPage.errorAgreeToTerms: O tlamehile ho dumela melawana le dipehelo.
registrationPage.alertSuccess: Ngodiso e atlehetse! Ka kopo tswela pele ho kena.
registrationPage.errorDefault: Ngodiso e hlolehile. Ka kopo leka hape.
registrationPage.errorWithStatus: Ngodiso e hlolehile (boemo {{status}}). Ka kopo leka hape.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Ho hlahile phoso e sa tsejweng ya neteweke. Ka kopo leka hape.
